# Info Extractor

A lightweight Chrome extension that helps you quickly extract and copy contact information from any webpage.

## Key Features
- 🔍 Automatically detects phone numbers and email addresses on any webpage
- 📋 One-click copy functionality for all detected information
- 🌐 Supports multiple phone number formats (including Taiwan, US, and international formats)
- ✨ Clean and intuitive user interface
- 🔒 Works locally without sending data to any server
- 🚫 No ads, no tracking, completely free

## How It Works
Simply click the extension icon while browsing any webpage, and it will instantly:
- Extract all phone numbers and email addresses from the current page
- Remove duplicates automatically
- Display results in an organized, easy-to-read format
- Allow you to copy any piece of information with just one click

## Privacy & Security
- No data collection or tracking
- All information processing happens locally in your browser
- No external server connections
- No permissions required except for current webpage access

## Support
If you find this extension helpful, consider buying me a coffee to support future development!
